\newcommand{\ottformula}{

\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{!}  b  \ottsym{=}  b'} {\textsf{M}}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline

\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{-}  {n_w}  \ottsym{=}  {n_w}} {\textsf{M}}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{+}  {n_w}  \ottsym{=}  {n_w}} {\textsf{M}}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{{n_w}  \ottsym{*}  {n_w}  \ottsym{=}  {n_w}} {\textsf{M}}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{{n_w}  \ottsym{/}  {n_w}  \ottsym{=}  {n_w}} {\textsf{M}}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{{n_w} \, \ottkw{mod} \, {n_w}  \ottsym{=}  {n_w}} {\textsf{M}}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{{n_w}  \ottsym{+}  {n_w}  \ottsym{=}  {n_w}} {\textsf{M}}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{{n_w}  \ottsym{-}  {n_w}  \ottsym{=}  {n_w}} {\textsf{M}}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{{n_w} \, \ottkw{EQ} \, {n_w}  \ottsym{=}  b} {\textsf{M}}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{b \, \ottkw{EQ} \, b'  \ottsym{=}  b''} {\textsf{M}}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{{n_w} \, \ottkw{SHL} \, {n_w}  \ottsym{=}  {n_w}} {\textsf{M}}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{{n_w} \, \ottkw{SHR} \, {n_w}  \ottsym{=}  {n_w}} {\textsf{M}}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{{n_w} \, \ottkw{LE} \, {n_w}  \ottsym{=}  b} {\textsf{M}}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{{n_w} \, \ottkw{GE} \, {n_w}  \ottsym{=}  b} {\textsf{M}}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{{n_w}  \ottsym{<}  {n_w}  \ottsym{=}  b} {\textsf{M}}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{{n_w}  \ottsym{>}  {n_w}  \ottsym{=}  b} {\textsf{M}}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{{n_w} \, \ottkw{NE} \, {n_w}  \ottsym{=}  b} {\textsf{M}}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{{n_w}  \ottsym{\&}  {n_w}  \ottsym{=}  {n_w}} {\textsf{M}}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{{n_w}  \ottsym{\mbox{$\uparrow$}}  {n_w}  \ottsym{=}  {n_w}} {\textsf{M}}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{{n_w}  \ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}}  {n_w}  \ottsym{=}  {n_w}} {\textsf{M}}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{b \, \ottkw{AND} \, b'  \ottsym{=}  b''} {\textsf{M}}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{b \, \ottkw{OR} \, b'  \ottsym{=}  b''} {\textsf{M}}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \varepsilon  = \mathrm{hd}  E } {\textsf{M}}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\gamma  \ottsym{=}  \varepsilon  \ottsym{[}  i  \ottsym{]}} {\textsf{M}}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{(}  \ottnt{stmt}  \ottsym{,}  x_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  x_{\ottmv{n}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{=}  F  \ottsym{(}  f  \ottsym{)}} {\textsf{M}}{}{}{\ottcom{function lookup}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ i = max  \{ j .  x   \in \mathrm{dom} (  \varepsilon  [j] )   \} } {\textsf{M}}{}{}{\ottcom{find max index of variable's scope}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ i  = length ( \varepsilon ) } {\textsf{M}}{}{}{\ottcom{find the current stack frame length}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{v}  \ottsym{=}  \gamma  \ottsym{(}  x  \ottsym{)}} {\textsf{M}}{}{}{\ottcom{look-up of variable in scope}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{v}  \ottsym{=} \, \ottkw{struct} \, \ottsym{\{}  x_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{;} \, ... \, \ottsym{;}  x_{\ottmv{n}}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{v_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{\}}  \ottsym{(}  x  \ottsym{)}} {\textsf{M}}{}{}{\ottcom{access fo field in struct}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{exp}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{exp\_list}  \ottsym{[}  i  \ottsym{]}} {\textsf{M}}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \ottnt{exp}  = \mathrm{hd} \,\,  \ottnt{exp\_list} } {\textsf{M}}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ b  = \mathrm{True} } {\textsf{M}}{}{}{\ottcom{condition true}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ b  = \mathrm{False} } {\textsf{M}}{}{}{\ottcom{condition false}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathit{exp}_1 , .. , \mathit{exp}_n = \{ \} } {\textsf{M}}{}{}{\ottcom{function arguments empty}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\gamma  \ottsym{=}  \gamma'} {\textsf{M}}{}{}{\ottcom{scope equality}}\ottprodnewline

%% defn exp_red
\newcommand{\ottdruleexpXXfuncXXcallXXnewframe}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottsym{(}  \ottnt{stmt}  \ottsym{,}  x_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  x_{\ottmv{n}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{=}  F  \ottsym{(}  f  \ottsym{)}}%
\ottpremise{\gamma'  \ottsym{=}   \forall i . (x_i \mapsto  \mathit{v}_i)   {\gamma}_{ \emptyset }  }%
\ottpremise{\gamma  \ottsym{=}  \varepsilon  \ottsym{[}  0  \ottsym{]}}%
\ottpremise{\varepsilon'  \ottsym{=}   \gamma'  \mathrel{\mathop:}:  \ottsym{[}  \gamma  \ottsym{]} }%
\ottpremise{E'  \ottsym{=}    \mathrm{tl} ( \varepsilon )   \mathrel{\mathop:}:  E }%
}{
 [  \ottkw{call} \, f  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{v_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{)}  ]  \ottsym{(}  \varepsilon  \ottsym{,}  E  \ottsym{)}  \rightsquigarrow [  \ottkw{exec} \, \ottnt{stmt}  ]  \ottsym{(}  \varepsilon'  \ottsym{,}  E'  \ottsym{)} }{%
{\ottdrulename{exp\_func\_call\_newframe}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleexpXXfuncXXexec}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottsym{[}  \ottnt{stmt}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{(}  \sigma  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{R} }   \ottsym{)}  \rightarrow  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{stmt'}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{(}  \sigma'  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{R} }   \ottsym{)}}%
}{
 [  \ottkw{exec} \, \ottnt{stmt}  ]  \sigma  \rightsquigarrow [  \ottkw{exec} \, \ottnt{stmt'}  ]  \sigma' }{%
{\ottdrulename{exp\_func\_exec}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleexpXXfuncXXretXXexp}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 [  \ottkw{exec} \,  \emptyset_{ \mathrm{stmt} }   ]  \sigma  \rightsquigarrow [  \ottnt{v}  ]  \sigma' }{%
{\ottdrulename{exp\_func\_ret\_exp}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleexpXXlookup}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ i = max  \{ j .  x   \in \mathrm{dom} (  \varepsilon  [j] )   \} }%
\ottpremise{\gamma  \ottsym{=}  \varepsilon  \ottsym{[}  i  \ottsym{]}}%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{v}  \ottsym{=}  \gamma  \ottsym{(}  x  \ottsym{)}}%
}{
 [  x  ]  \ottsym{(}  \varepsilon  \ottsym{,}  E  \ottsym{)}  \rightsquigarrow [  \ottnt{v}  ]  \ottsym{(}  \varepsilon  \ottsym{,}  E  \ottsym{)} }{%
{\ottdrulename{exp\_lookup}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleexpXXacc}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{v}  \ottsym{=} \, \ottkw{struct} \, \ottsym{\{}  x_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{;} \, ... \, \ottsym{;}  x_{\ottmv{n}}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{v_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{\}}  \ottsym{(}  x  \ottsym{)}}%
}{
 [   struct   \ottsym{.}  x  ]  \sigma  \rightsquigarrow [  \ottnt{v}  ]  \sigma' }{%
{\ottdrulename{exp\_acc}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleexpXXfuncXXcallXXargs}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{exp\_list'}  \ottsym{++}  \ottnt{exp\_list''}  =  \ottnt{exp_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{exp_{\ottmv{n}}} }%
\ottpremise{ \mathrm{is\_consts} \,\,  \ottnt{exp\_list'} }%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{exp}  = \mathrm{hd} \,\,  \ottnt{exp\_list''} }%
\ottpremise{ [  \ottnt{exp}  ]  \sigma  \rightsquigarrow [  \ottnt{exp'}  ]  \sigma' }%
\ottpremise{ i  = \mathrm{len} \,\,  \ottnt{exp\_list'} }%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{exp'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{exp'_{\ottmv{m}}}  =   ( i  \mapsto   \ottnt{exp'} )  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{exp_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{exp_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{)}  }%
}{
 [  \ottkw{call} \, f  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{exp_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{exp_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{)}  ]  \sigma  \rightsquigarrow [  \ottkw{call} \, f  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{exp'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{exp'_{\ottmv{m}}}  \ottsym{)}  ]  \sigma }{%
{\ottdrulename{exp\_func\_call\_args}}{}%
}}

\ottpremise{\gamma  \ottsym{=}  \varepsilon  \ottsym{[}  0  \ottsym{]}}%
\ottpremise{ \varepsilon'  \mathrel{\mathop:}:  E'   \ottsym{=}  E}%
\ottpremise{\varepsilon''  \ottsym{=}   \ottsym{(}  \varepsilon'  \ottsym{)}  \mathrel{\mathop+}+  \ottsym{(}  \ottsym{[}  \gamma  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{)} }%
}{
\ottsym{[}  \ottkw{return} \, \ottnt{v}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{(}  \ottsym{(}  \varepsilon  \ottsym{,}  E  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{R} }   \ottsym{)}  \rightarrow  \ottsym{[}   \emptyset_{ \mathrm{stmt} }   \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{(}  \ottsym{(}  \varepsilon''  \ottsym{,}  E'  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{Ret} \,\,  \ottnt{v} }   \ottsym{)}}{%
{\ottdrulename{stmt\_ret}}{}%
}}

{\ottdrulename{stmt\_verify\_3}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulestmtXXverifyXXFour}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\ottsym{[}  \ottkw{verify} \, \ottkw{false} \, \ottsym{(}  \ottkw{errmsg} \, x  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{(}  \sigma  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{R} }   \ottsym{)}  \rightarrow  \ottsym{[}   \emptyset_{ \mathrm{stmt} }   \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{(}  \sigma'  \ottsym{,}  \ottkw{Reject} \, x  \ottsym{)}}{%
{\ottdrulename{stmt\_verify\_4}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulestmtXXtransition}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\ottsym{[}   transition  p   \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{(}  \sigma  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{R} }   \ottsym{)}  \rightarrow  \ottsym{[}   \emptyset_{ \mathrm{stmt} }   \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{(}  \sigma  \ottsym{,}  p  \ottsym{)}}{%
{\ottdrulename{stmt\_transition}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulestmtXXretXXexp}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ [  \ottnt{exp}  ]  \sigma  \rightsquigarrow [  \ottnt{exp'}  ]  \sigma' }%
}{
\ottsym{[}  \ottkw{return} \, \ottnt{exp}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{(}  \sigma  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{R} }   \ottsym{)}  \rightarrow  \ottsym{[}  \ottkw{return} \, \ottnt{exp'}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{(}  \sigma'  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{R} }   \ottsym{)}}{%
{\ottdrulename{stmt\_ret\_exp}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulestmtXXassXXexp}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ [  \ottnt{exp}  ]  \sigma  \rightsquigarrow [  \ottnt{exp'}  ]  \sigma' }%
}{
\ottsym{[}   x  \mathrel{\mathop:}=  \ottnt{exp}   \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{(}  \sigma  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{R} }   \ottsym{)}  \rightarrow  \ottsym{[}   x  \mathrel{\mathop:}=  \ottnt{exp'}   \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{(}  \sigma'  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{R} }   \ottsym{)}}{%
{\ottdrulename{stmt\_ass\_exp}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulestmtXXcondXXexp}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ [  \ottnt{exp}  ]  \sigma  \rightsquigarrow [  \ottnt{exp'}  ]  \sigma' }%
}{
\ottsym{[}  \ottkw{if} \, \ottnt{exp} \, \ottkw{then} \, \ottnt{stmt_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottkw{else} \, \ottnt{stmt_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{(}  \sigma  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{R} }   \ottsym{)}  \rightarrow  \ottsym{[}  \ottkw{if} \, \ottnt{exp'} \, \ottkw{then} \, \ottnt{stmt_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottkw{else} \, \ottnt{stmt_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{(}  \sigma'  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{R} }   \ottsym{)}}{%
{\ottdrulename{stmt\_cond\_exp}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulestmtXXverifyXXexpOne}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ [  \ottnt{exp}  ]  \sigma  \rightsquigarrow [  \ottnt{exp''}  ]  \sigma' }%
}{
\ottsym{[}  \ottkw{verify} \, \ottnt{exp} \, \ottnt{exp'}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{(}  \sigma  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{R} }   \ottsym{)}  \rightarrow  \ottsym{[}  \ottkw{verify} \, \ottnt{exp''} \, \ottnt{exp'}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{(}  \sigma'  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{R} }   \ottsym{)}}{%
{\ottdrulename{stmt\_verify\_exp1}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulestmtXXverifyXXexpTwo}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ [  \ottnt{exp}  ]  \sigma  \rightsquigarrow [  \ottnt{exp'}  ]  \sigma' }%
}{
\ottsym{[}  \ottkw{verify} \, b \, \ottnt{exp}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{(}  \sigma  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{R} }   \ottsym{)}  \rightarrow  \ottsym{[}  \ottkw{verify} \, b \, \ottnt{exp'}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{(}  \sigma'  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{R} }   \ottsym{)}}{%
{\ottdrulename{stmt\_verify\_exp2}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnstmtXXred}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\ottsym{[}  \ottnt{stmt}  \ottsym{]}  s  \rightarrow  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{stmt'}  \ottsym{]}  s'$}{\ottcom{statement semantics}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulestmtXXret{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulestmtXXassXXv{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulestmtXXseqOne{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulestmtXXseqTwo{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulestmtXXseqThree{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulestmtXXcondTwo{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulestmtXXcondThree{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulestmtXXdecl{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulestmtXXblockXXenter{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulestmtXXblockXXexec{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulestmtXXblockXXexit{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulestmtXXverifyXXThree{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulestmtXXverifyXXFour{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulestmtXXtransition{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulestmtXXretXXexp{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulestmtXXassXXexp{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulestmtXXcondXXexp{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulestmtXXverifyXXexpOne{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulestmtXXverifyXXexpTwo{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnsstmtXXsem}{
\ottdefnstmtXXred{}}

% defns pars_sem
%% defn pars_red
\newcommand{\ottdruleparsXXstmt}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottsym{[}  \ottnt{stmt}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{(}  \sigma  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{R} }   \ottsym{)}  \rightarrow  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{stmt'}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{(}  \sigma'  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{R} }   \ottsym{)}}%
}{
\ottsym{[}  \ottnt{stmt}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{(}  \sigma  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{R} }   \ottsym{)}  \longrightarrow  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{stmt'}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{(}  \sigma'  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{R} }   \ottsym{)}}{%
{\ottdrulename{pars\_stmt}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleparsXXstate}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottsym{[}  \ottnt{stmt}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{(}  \sigma  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{R} }   \ottsym{)}  \rightarrow  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{stmt'}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{(}  \sigma'  \ottsym{,}  \ottkw{Trans} \, x  \ottsym{)}}%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{stmt''}  \ottsym{=}  P  \ottsym{(}  x  \ottsym{)}}%
}{
\ottsym{[}  \ottnt{stmt}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{(}  \sigma  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{R} }   \ottsym{)}  \longrightarrow  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{stmt''}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{(}  \sigma'  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{R} }   \ottsym{)}}{%
{\ottdrulename{pars\_state}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnparsXXred}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\ottsym{[}  \ottnt{stmt}  \ottsym{]}  s  \longrightarrow  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{stmt'}  \ottsym{]}  s'$}{\ottcom{parser semantics}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleparsXXstmt{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleparsXXstate{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnsparsXXsem}{
\ottdefnparsXXred{}}

\newcommand{\ottdruleparsXXtXXfin}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottsym{[}  \ottnt{stmt}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{(}  \sigma  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{R} }   \ottsym{)}  \rightarrow  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{stmt'}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{(}  \sigma  \ottsym{,}  p_{ \mathrm{fin} }  \ottsym{)}}%
}{
\ottsym{[}  \ottnt{stmt}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{(}  \sigma  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{R} }   \ottsym{)}  \longrightarrow  \ottsym{(}  \sigma  \ottsym{,}  p_{ \mathrm{fin} }  \ottsym{)}}{%
{\ottdrulename{pars\_t\_fin}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleparsXXtXXempty}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottsym{[}  \ottnt{stmt}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{(}  \sigma  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{R} }   \ottsym{)}  \rightarrow  \ottsym{[}   \emptyset_{ \mathrm{stmt} }   \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{(}  \sigma'  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{R} }   \ottsym{)}}%
\ottpremise{ x  = \mathrm{ParserStateEnd} }%
}{
\ottsym{[}  \ottnt{stmt}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{(}  \sigma  \ottsym{,}   { \mathbf{R} }   \ottsym{)}  \longrightarrow  \ottsym{(}  \sigma'  \ottsym{,}  \ottkw{Reject} \, x  \ottsym{)}}{%
{\ottdrulename{pars\_t\_empty}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnparsXXtXXred}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\ottsym{[}  \ottnt{stmt}  \ottsym{]}  s  \longrightarrow  s'$}{\ottcom{parser semantics, final step}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleparsXXtXXfin{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleparsXXtXXempty{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}
